newsitem.title: USA: Leasing Edge holders approve rise in shares.
newsitem.headline: Leasing Edge holders approve rise in shares.

text.p: Leasing Edge Corp on Monday said its shareholders have approved a change in the company's name to LEC Technologies Inc and an increase of the authorized common stock to 25 million shares from 12.5 million.
"The company's new name LEC Technologies better reflects our corporate structure and various business lines," Michael Daniels, chief executive, said in a statement.
The increase in authorized shares gives the company the ability to raise additional capital for growth and possible acquisitions, Daniels said.
